name_raw: The Serpent's Coil ‚Äì Sculpted 3D Snake Taper Candles (Pair)
description_raw: Invite the ancient symbol of wisdom and rebirth to your altar with The Serpent's Coil Taper Set . These aren't ordinary candles; they are miniature sculptures. Each tall white taper features a lifelike, 3D snake coiled tightly around the shaft, hand-painted with intricate scale details. When lit, the melting wax creates a dramatic interplay between the pristine candle and the winding serpent. Available in two distinct finishes to match your aesthetic: The Gilded Serpent: A white candle wrapped in a shimmering Gold Snake for a touch of opulence. The Shadow Serpent: A white candle wrapped in a matte Black Snake (with gold accents) for a darker, witchy vibe. Burn them during rituals of transformation or place them on your dining table to captivate your guests. Key Features: 3D Sculpted Design: Features a realistic snake wrapped around the wax. Two Style Options: Choose between Gold or Black snake finishes. Clean Burning: Smokeless wax for a pure, steady flame. Statement Size: 10" (25cm) tall, perfect for standard taper holders. Set of Two: Each box contains two matching candles.

name_raw: The Twilight Blush Ritual Candle ‚Äì Black Rose & Cork
description_raw: Ignite the magic of the evening with The Twilight Blush Ritual Candle . Infused with the captivating scent of dark roses and twilight musk, this candle is designed to put you under its spell. Housed in a sleek black glass vessel, it features a natural cork lid printed with a mystical starburst rose design. The "Twilight Blush" fragrance offers an enchanting blend of darkness and allure‚Äîperfect for setting the mood during meditation, tarot readings, or a relaxing soak in the tub. Packaged in a matching gothic slide-box, it makes an effortless gift for the modern witch or a treat for your own altar. Key Features: Scent Profile: Twilight Blush (a mysterious, floral blend). Eco-Luxe Design: Reusable black glass jar with a printed natural cork lid. Gift-Ready: Comes in a matching illustrated slide-out box. Burn Time: Approximately 21 hours of illumination. Dimensions: 14.1 oz (400g) total weight.

name_raw: The Verdant Gradient ‚Äì Spiral Taper Candle Set (4-Pack)
description_raw: Bring the stillness of the deep woods into your home with The Verdant Gradient Taper Set . This curated collection of four handcrafted spiral candles captures the many shades of the forest. The set creates a perfect tonal gradient, ranging from a whisper-light hemlock green, through calming sage, to a rich, dark moss. The twisted shape evokes vines climbing a trellis or roots winding through the earth. Perfect for Yule celebrations, Earth elemental rituals, or simply adding a touch of biophilic gothic charm to your dining table. Burn them together to create a lush, living centerpiece. Key Features: Tonal Gradient: Includes four distinct shades of green (Pale, Sage, Olive, and Forest). Sculptural Spiral: Twisted vine-like shape adds organic texture. Earth Element: Perfect for green witches, herbalists, and nature lovers. Clean Burn: Smokeless, dripless, and non-toxic high-quality wax. Set of Four: Includes four candles in a gift-ready box. Dimensions: Approx. 9.6" (24.5cm) tall.

name_raw: The Witching Hour Ritual Candle ‚Äì White Sage Cleansing Blend
description_raw: Clear the energy and reset your sanctuary with The Witching Hour Ritual Candle . When the clock strikes twelve‚Äîor whenever you need a fresh start‚Äîlight this candle to release the purifying aroma of white sage. Unlike the smoke of burning bundles, this candle offers a cleaner, softer way to banish negative vibes and invite clarity into your space. Housed in a reusable black glass vessel, it features a natural cork lid printed with a classic flying witch silhouette. Packaged in a matching gothic slide-box, it is an essential tool for your altar, a thoughtful housewarming gift, or a daily ritual for peace of mind. Key Features: Scent Profile: White Sage (herbal, fresh, and purifying). Ritual Ready: Perfect for cleansing a space without the heavy smoke of smudge sticks. Eco-Luxe Design: Black glass jar with a printed natural cork lid (Witch motif). Gift-Ready: Comes in a matching illustrated slide-out box. Burn Time: Approximately 21 hours.

name_raw: The Emerald Boudoir Ottoman ‚Äì Vintage Velvet & Gold Fringe
description_raw: A Seat Fit for a Queen of the Night. Drape your home in the luxury of the Old World with the Emerald Boudoir Ottoman . This piece is a masterclass in vintage glamour, blending the richness of deep emerald velvet with the drama of cascading gold bullion fringe. Designed to evoke the feeling of a 1920s speakeasy or a Victorian seance room, this accent seat features a plush, button-tufted top and gold rope trim that circles the waist like a corset. It is versatile enough to serve as a footrest for your favorite velvet armchair, a vanity seat for your morning rituals, or simply a stunning accent piece that demands attention. Why It Belongs in Your Lair: Opulent Texture: Soft, high-quality emerald green velvet that catches the light beautifully. Dramatic Detail: The thick gold fringe adds movement and vintage sophistication to any room. Versatile Function: Perfect as a vanity stool, extra seating for coven gatherings, or a footrest. Sturdy & Soft: Built with a solid wood frame for durability but cushioned for comfort. The Details: Dimensions: 24" Diameter x 18" Height Material: Velvet Upholstery, Gold Bullion Fringe Color: Emerald Green & Gold
